title: Hanging, "Syrian Pomegranate Tree", 1919–26
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyed (batik) on plain weave, predominately warp faced
markings: Artist's monogram in lower right corner: LBB
description: Vertical rectangular silk mural. Landscape with man carrying a basket of pomegranates on his head, standing to right of pomegranate tree. Borders are a repeat of pointed arches. Colors: violet, light grey plus red on ivory fabric. Lined with light rose cotton plain weave. Hanging cord loops attached at top. Slightly faded.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Syrian Pomegranate Tree", 1919–26.
1919–26. Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist dyed (batik) on plain weave, predominately warp faced. Gift of Lydia Bush-Brown. 1974-23-3.
